documentType: prison count sheet and inmate roster
summary: This document is a Bureau of Prisons count sheet and inmate roster from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York for July 26, 2019. It records the official inmate count across various housing units, including a specific entry for inmate Gama-Pineda, who was on suicide watch. This is the facility where Jeffrey Epstein was held and died.

persons.name: Gama-Pineda
persons.context: Listed on the inmate roster with registration number 85918-054, assigned to a hospital/suicide watch unit on July 26, 2019.

events.title: Daily Inmate Count at MCC New York
events.description: Official inmate count conducted at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, recording a total of 770 inmates across various housing units.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY
keyFacts: The document is dated July 26, 2019, which is less than two weeks before Jeffrey Epstein's death in the same facility on August 10, 2019.
The total inmate count recorded was 770 individuals across the facility's housing units.
Inmate Gama-Pineda (Reg # 85918-054) is specifically listed as being in a hospital/suicide watch assignment, indicating the facility's protocols for monitoring at-risk inmates.
The document is a routine administrative record showing the Bureau of Prisons' standard counting procedures.
The count was verified and cleared at approximately 3:20 AM on July 26, 2019.
